1.title: A Shield Against the Darkness
1.plot: Ace pilot Jack McGraw is recruited by a woman from his past to defend the world against the supernatural threat of an occult society. He is reunited with his comrades from the war and put in command of an experimental airship.

2.title: Caribbean Crisis
2.plot: The Daedalus crew encounters a group of sky pirates over the Bahamas, whose captain is a friend of Jack's. When Freetown is bombed by the super-zeppelin Luftpanzer, the combined crews fly to defend it, only to have the giant ship vanish.

3.title: The Cross of Cadiz
3.plot: The crew discovers a map to a shipwreck in the home of a dying voodoo priest. After nearly avoiding death by dynamite and crocodile, they locate a mystical artifact - guarded by a legendary sea monster.

4.title: Amazon Adventure
4.plot: After battling "rocket-zombies" and crashing into the jungle canopy, the crew encounters the Tree People of the Amazon, joining forces to thwart Aleaister Crowley's diabolical summoning ritual.

locations: Youngstown Cultural Arts Center, Seattle, Washington, USA
imdb.plot outline: "Captain Stratosphere" Jack McGraw, ace pilot in the Great War, leads a stalwart crew on a bold quest aboard an experimental airship. Traveling from New Jersey to Haiti to the jungle canopy of the Amazon, our heroes battle the evil machinations of the sorcerer Aleister Crowley and his dark army, the Astrum Argentum. Along the way they battle saboteurs, sky pirates, a giant octopus, rocket zombies and encounter a tribe of natives who live in a majestic city in the treetops - all in two-fisted pulp adventure tradition.
imdb.title: Airship Daedalus Radio Adventures
plot: "Captain Stratosphere" Jack McGraw, ace pilot in the Great War, leads a stalwart crew on a bold quest aboard an experimental airship. Traveling from New Jersey to Haiti to the jungle canopy of the Amazon, our heroes battle the evil machinations of the sorcerer Aleister Crowley and his dark army, the Astrum Argentum. Along the way they battle saboteurs, sky pirates, a giant octopus, rocket zombies and encounter a tribe of natives who live in a majestic city in the treetops - all in two-fisted pulp adventure tradition.

In an alternate 1920s timeline, Ace pilot "Captain Stratosphere" Jack McGraw leads an intrepid crew against sinister forces of evil set to take over the world. Using an experimental airship, Daedalus II, the crew plays a dangerous game of cat and mouse with the Astrum Argentum and their commander Maria Blutig, from the eastern US to the Caribbean, to the wild green jungles of the Amazon. They encounter saboteurs, sky pirates, a powerful voodoo priest, man-eating crocodiles, a giant treasure-guarding octopus, rocket-zombies, and a tribe of jungle natives living in a majestic wooden city in the tree canopy, culminating in a ferocious battle against Blutig and her master, the sorcerer Aleister Crowley. This four-part serial adapted from the original comic strip uses a retro radio style of delivery, including the fictional Gold Star Essentials commercial sponsor, a crushed monophonic sound mix and vintage wire crackle.
